properties.info: Rajasthan completed the installation of about 1767 MW of wind and 45 MW of solar generation at the end of 2011 using surplus transmission capacity in the grid
properties.title: RAJASTHAN RENEWABLE ENERGY TRANSMISSION INVESTMENT PROGRAM - TRANCHE 1
